cashback.title: Cashback Rewards

directCashback.title: Direct Cashback
directCashback.description: Earn 15% of the amount invested by each direct referral. Example: Refer someone who invests $1,000, you receive $150 USDT instantly.

networkCashback.title: Network Cashback
networkCashback.description: Earn a percentage of the fees generated from investments within your referral network, up to 9 levels deep (7.5, 4%, 3%, 2.5%, 2%, 1%, 0.75%, 0.5%). Example: Level 3 referrals generate $10,000, you earn $400 USDT.

universalCashback.title: Universal Cashback
universalCashback.description: 10% of the fees from ALL investments in the platform are distributed among all EGD token holders. Example: $1,000,000 in fees = $100,000 shared among holders.

performanceCashback.title: Performance Cashback
performanceCashback.description: Boost your earnings by reaching investment or ride volume targets. Weekly: $10,000 = $100 USDT, $50,000 = $500 USDT. Monthly: $100,000 = $1,000 USDT.

viralCashback.title: Viral Cashback
viralCashback.description: Earn extra cashback when new users join through your referral network. Their investment will raise your ranking and you can get USDT or vehicle option according to your ranking.

cashback.note: Note: Cashback rewards are distributed automatically and can be withdrawn or reinvested as needed.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.subtitle: Understanding the GREEN token distribution and economics

burnMechanism.title: Burn Mechanism
burnMechanism.description: 2% of all transactions are automatically burned, reducing total supply over time and increasing token value.

stakingRewards.title: Staking Rewards
stakingRewards.description: Daily rewards distributed to stakers, with higher rewards for longer staking periods and larger amounts.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from our community members

testimonial1.quote: GreenDash has transformed my investment strategy. The daily rewards are incredible, and I love supporting sustainable mobility!
testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.quote: I've been staking for 3 months and the returns are amazing. The platform is user-friendly and the community is supportive.
testimonial2.name: Michael Chen

testimonial3.quote: Best decision I made this year! GreenDash combines great returns with a meaningful mission. Highly recommended!
testimonial3.name: Emma Rodriguez

testimonial4.quote: The affiliate program is fantastic. I'm earning both from staking and referrals. This is the future of investing!
testimonial4.name: David Kim

testimonial5.quote: Professional platform with transparent operations. The team is responsive and the technology is solid.
testimonial5.name: Lisa Thompson
